verses.verse: And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> out of Shittim <WH7851> two <WH8147> men <WH582> to spy <WH7270> <WH8764> secretly <WH2791>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Go <WH3212> <WH8798> view <WH7200> <WH8798> the land <WH776>, even Yericho <WH3405>. And they went <WH3212> <WH8799>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> into an harlot's <WH2181> <WH8802> house <WH802> <WH1004>, named <WH8034> Rachav <WH7343>, and lodged <WH7901> <WH8799> there.

And it was told <WH559> <WH8735> the king <WH4428> of Yericho <WH3405>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Behold, there came <WH935> <WH8804> men <WH582> in hither to night <WH3915> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> to search out <WH2658> <WH8800> the country <WH776>.

And the king <WH4428> of Yericho <WH3405> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> unto Rachav <WH7343>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Bring forth <WH3318> <WH8685> the men <WH582> that are come <WH935> <WH8802> to thee, which are entered <WH935> <WH8804> into thine house <WH1004>: for they be come <WH935> <WH8804> to search out <WH2658> <WH8800> all the country <WH776>.

And the woman <WH802> took <WH3947> <WH8799> the two <WH8147> men <WH582>, and hid <WH6845> <WH8799> them, and said <WH559> <WH8799> thus, There came <WH935> <WH8804> men <WH582> unto me, but I wist <WH3045> <WH8804> not whence <WH370> they were:

And it came to pass about the time of shutting <WH5462> <WH8800> of the gate <WH8179>, when it was dark <WH2822>, that the men <WH582> went out <WH3318> <WH8804>: whither the men <WH582> went <WH1980> <WH8804> I wot <WH3045> <WH8804> not: pursue <WH7291> <WH8798> after <WH310> them quickly <WH4118>; for ye shall overtake <WH5381> <WH8686> them.

But she had brought them up <WH5927> <WH8689> to the roof <WH1406> of the house, and hid <WH2934> <WH8799> them with the stalks <WH6086> of flax <WH6593>, which she had laid in order <WH6186> <WH8803> upon the roof <WH1406>.

And the men <WH582> pursued <WH7291> <WH8804> after <WH310> them the way <WH1870> to Yarden <WH3383> unto the fords <WH4569>: and as soon as they which pursued <WH7291> <WH8802> after <WH310> them were gone out <WH3318> <WH8804>, they shut <WH5462> <WH8804> the gate <WH8179>.
And before they were laid down <WH7901> <WH8799>, she came up <WH5927> <WH8804> unto them upon the roof <WH1406>;

And she said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the men <WH582>, I know <WH3045> <WH8804> that the YY <WH3068> hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> you the land <WH776>, and that your terror <WH367> is fallen <WH5307> <WH8804> upon us, and that all the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the land <WH776> faint <WH4127> <WH8738> because <WH6440> of you.

For we have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> how the YY <WH3068> dried up <WH3001> <WH8689> the water <WH4325> of the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220> for you <WH6440>, when ye came out <WH3318> <WH8800> of Egypt <WH4714>; and what ye did <WH6213> <WH8804> unto the two <WH8147> kings <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, that were on the other side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383>, Sichon <WH5511> and Og <WH5747>, whom ye utterly destroyed <WH2763> <WH8689>.

And as soon as we had heard <WH8085> <WH8799> these things, our hearts <WH3824> did melt <WH4549> <WH8735>, neither did there remain <WH6965> <WH8804> any more courage <WH7307> in any man <WH376>, because <WH6440> of you: for the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, he is 'Elohim <WH430> in heaven <WH8064> above <WH4605>, and in earth <WH776> beneath.

Now therefore, I pray you, swear <WH7650> <WH8734> unto me by the YY <WH3068>, since <WH3588> I have shewed <WH6213> <WH8804> you kindness <WH2617>, that ye will also shew <WH6213> <WH8804> kindness <WH2617> unto my father's <WH1> house <WH1004>, and give <WH5414> <WH8804> me a true <WH571> token <WH226>:

And that ye will save alive <WH2421> <WH8689> my father <WH1>, and my mother <WH517>, and my brethren <WH251>, and my sisters <WH269>, and all that they have, and deliver <WH5337> <WH8689> our lives <WH5315> from death <WH4194>.

And the men <WH582> answered <WH559> <WH8799> her, Our life <WH5315> for yours <WH4191> <WH8800>, if ye utter <WH5046> <WH8686> not this our business <WH1697>. And it shall be, when the YY <WH3068> hath given <WH5414> <WH8800> us the land <WH776>, that we will deal <WH6213> <WH8804> kindly <WH2617> and truly <WH571> with thee.

Then she let them down <WH3381> <WH8686> by a cord <WH2256> through <WH1157> the window <WH2474>: for her house <WH1004> was upon the town <WH7023> wall <WH2346>, and she dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> upon the wall <WH2346>.

And she said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Get <WH3212> <WH8798> you to the mountain <WH2022>, lest the pursuers <WH7291> <WH8802> meet <WH6293> <WH8799> you; and hide <WH2247> <WH8738> yourselves there three <WH7969> days <WH3117>, until the pursuers <WH7291> <WH8802> be returned <WH7725> <WH8800>: and afterward <WH310> may ye go <WH3212> <WH8799> your way <WH1870>.
And the men <WH582> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, We will be blameless <WH5355> of this thine oath <WH7621> which thou hast made us swear <WH7650> <WH8689>.

Behold, when we come <WH935> <WH8802> into the land <WH776>, thou shalt bind <WH7194> <WH8799> this line <WH8615> of scarlet <WH8144> thread <WH2339> in the window <WH2474> which thou didst let us down by <WH3381> <WH8689>: and thou shalt bring <WH622> <WH8799> thy father <WH1>, and thy mother <WH517>, and thy brethren <WH251>, and all thy father's <WH1> household <WH1004>, home <WH1004> unto thee.

And it shall be, that whosoever <WH834> shall go out <WH3318> <WH8799> of the doors <WH1817> of thy house <WH1004> into the street <WH2351>, his blood <WH1818> shall be upon his head <WH7218>, and we will be guiltless <WH5355>: and whosoever shall be with thee in the house <WH1004>, his blood <WH1818> shall be on our head <WH7218>, if any hand <WH3027> be upon him.
And if thou utter <WH5046> <WH8686> this our business <WH1697>, then we will be quit <WH5355> of thine oath <WH7621> which thou hast made us to swear <WH7650> <WH8689>.

And she said <WH559> <WH8799>, According unto your words <WH1697>, so be it. And she sent them away <WH7971> <WH8762>, and they departed <WH3212> <WH8799>: and she bound <WH7194> <WH8799> the scarlet <WH8144> line <WH8615> in the window <WH2474>.

And they went <WH3212> <WH8799>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> unto the mountain <WH2022>, and abode <WH3427> <WH8799> there three <WH7969> days <WH3117>, until the pursuers <WH7291> <WH8802> were returned <WH7725> <WH8804>: and the pursuers <WH7291> <WH8802> sought <WH1245> <WH8762> them throughout all the way <WH1870>, but found <WH4672> <WH8804> them not.

So the two <WH8147> men <WH582> returned <WH7725> <WH8799>, and descended <WH3381> <WH8799> from the mountain <WH2022>, and passed over <WH5674> <WH8799>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> to Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, and told <WH5608> <WH8762> him all things that befell <WH4672> <WH8802> them:

And they said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, Truly <WH3588> the YY <WH3068> hath delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> into our hands <WH3027> all the land <WH776>; for even all the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the country <WH776> do faint <WH4127> <WH8738> because <WH6440> of us.
